info.title: Smart Protector of sea and land
info.desc: Welcome to EcoGuard, the website that allows both terrestrial and marine sensors, satellite imagery, and artificial intelligence to protect and preserve biodiversity in both land and water ecosystems

featureHeader.title: What we offer
featureHeader.desc: EcoGuard offers a range of features that enable effective and efficient conservation efforts across different domains. Some of the features are:

aboutUs.title: A smart solution for conservation
aboutUs.desc: we harnesses the power of terrestrial and marine sensors, satellite imagery, and artificial intelligence to protect and preserve biodiversity in both land and water ecosystems. By enabling marine and terrestrial monitoring, cross-integration, and real-time data analysis, we empower conservationists, researchers, and environmental organizations to monitor and manage protected areas effectively. Together, we can work towards a more sustainable future for our planet's precious ecosystems.

feature1.title: Geospatial Data Analysis
feature1.desc: Google Earth Engine provides a powerful platform for analyzing and visualizing geospatial data. It offers a vast collection of satellite imagery and other geospatial datasets that can be accessed and processed for various analysis tasks.

feature2.title: Time-Series Analysis
feature2.desc: Google Earth Engine enables you to analyze changes in geospatial data over time. It provides tools and functions to perform time-series analysis, allowing you to track and monitor various environmental and land-use changes.

feature3.title: Marine Monitoring
feature3.desc: We use underwater sensors and satellite data to monitor coral reefs, marine life, and water quality. We apply machine learning to analyze underwater imagery and detect threats to marine ecosystems

feature4.title: Terrestrial Monitoring
feature4.desc: We use land-based sensors and satellite imagery to monitor ecosystems, wildlife migration, and deforestation. We apply AI to analyze satellite imagery and identify changes in land cover, habitat loss, and threats to biodiversity.

reason1.title: Real time information
reason1.desc: Gain access to reliable and up-to-date information on the status and trends of ecosystems

reason2.title: Real time information
reason2.desc: Detect and respond to environmental issues and threats in a timely manner

reason3.title: Real time information
reason3.desc: improve the planning and implementation of conservation actions and policies

reason4.title: Real time information
reason4.desc: Raise awareness and engagement among the public and the stake holders on the importance of conservation.
